definitions: a form of team game played in North America with an oval ball on a field marked out as a gridiron
shortDefinitions: team game in which ball is kicked

definitions: play in a game of football, especially when stylish and entertaining

examples.text: his team played some impressive football

definitions: a ball used in football, either oval (as in American football) or round (as in soccer), typically made of leather or plastic and filled with compressed air.
a topical issue that is the subject of continued argument or controversy

examples.text: the use of education as a political football

shortDefinitions: issue etc. causing continued argument or controversy

definitions: a briefcase containing authentication codes and other items that allow the US president to authorize a nuclear strike at any time

examples.text: wherever the president travels, a military aide stays close with the football
whose fingers would we prefer to have on America's nuclear football?

shortDefinitions: briefcase containing authentication codes that allow US President to authorize nuclear strike
